author: Maik Scherder
title: Making a Affordable $2 Steak With An Unexpected Twist
content:
Ingredients:

1 pound thin cut chuck steak
2 tablespoons butter
Steak seasoning
Lemon pepper
Worcestershire sauce
Preparation:

Place the butter in a pan and begin to heat the pan
Add the steak and poke it with a fork many times to allow the seasoning to get inside
Shake some steak seasoning all over it, followed by lemon pepper
Coat in Worcestershire sauce, make sure you shake the bottle as directed
Flip the steak and move it around to soak up the juices in the pan
Add more steak seasoning to the steak
Continue to flip and move it around to soak up the juices till well done
